title: GAME CRASHES AFTER 6.14 PATCH
body: My game has been crashing when I try to accept the game its been doing this to my friends also plz help

replies.body: ya i've been getting a crash or two daily from the new drafting champion select screen. the cilent would freeze and say not responding after locking in a champ

In order to get a better idea of what's going on, can you give me a more detailed description of what you see when the client crashes? Are you seeing a specific error message or a particular behaviour? With this information, I'll be able to offer a set of steps that should address the problem. Thanks!
it just stops responding and we need to restart it

It sounds like your network is having issues connecting to the game servers, so it's causing the client to become unresponsive.  As a first step, I recommend going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this resolved for good.  Let me know how this goes for you, or if the issue persists!
